name: e_review_hub
description: E-Review Hub is a modern and responsive Flutter application built with GetX, designed to provide an interactive e-commerce review experience. The app features a dynamic banner slider with smooth animations, a top-ranked product review list, and a horizontal scrolling section for the best reviewers. Users can explore product reviews, navigate seamlessly, and view detailed reviewer profiles. The UI is pixel-perfect and optimized for all screen sizes to ensure a consistent user experience.
